segment.documentation: BGM, A segment for specifying message name and function.
RFF, A segment containing references to the Insurance Premium document and the Insurance Contract to which this Insurance Premium message relates.
DTM, A segment specifying the dates related to the Insurance Premium message and the Insurance Contract to which this Insurance Premium message relates.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments providing characteristics regarding the Insurance Premium document.

segment.documentation: ATT, A segment specifying the type of Insurance Premium document, providing collection specification and coinsurance information.
PCD, A segment to specify the percentage of the total premium for a coinsurance contract, covered by the Insurance Premium document.
ICD, A segment indicating the Main Class of Business.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments providing identification, names and addresses, contacts and references of the involved parties.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment for identifying either by name and address, or by code, the parties and their function in the Insurance Premium message.
ATT, A segment specifying characteristics of the involved party.
CTA, A segment giving additional contact information of the party specified in the NAD.
COM, A segment specifying the communication channel and number for the contact specified in the CTA or the party specified in the NAD.
RFF, A segment for additional identifying references of the party specified in the NAD.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments describing a set of insurance products, guarantees and risks covered by the insurance contract and the amounts due in order to be covered during an indicated period.

segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the starting date and the end date of the period for which the premium is due.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments providing details of the insurance product, guarantees and risks covered by the insurance contract and the amounts due in order to be covered during the above mentioned period.

segment.documentation: ICD, A segment specifying the insurance product, guarantee and risk covered by the insurance contract.

FTX, A segment providing free format text or coded information that is not purely Insurance Premium related, but that is to be added to the Insurance Premium document following national legal regulations.
RFF, A segment providing unique identification of the risk.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments providing details of the amounts due in order to be covered for the above mentioned guarantees and risks during the above mentioned period.

segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying detailed amounts.
DTM, A segment specifying overriding periods.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments providing details of indices used to calculate premium amounts.

segment.documentation: IND, A segment specifying indices.
DTM, A segment specifying the reference year of an indice.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments providing details about commission amounts.

segment.documentation: ATT, A segment specifying collection and calculation of commission amounts.
PCD, A segment specifying the percentage of the commission.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments providing details about tax amounts.

segment.documentation: TAX, A segment specifying the tax amount.
PCD, A segment specifying the percentage of the tax.
CUX, A segment specifying the currency of the amounts and relevant details for the rate of exchange.
MOA, A segment specifying total amounts of this Insurance Premium message.
FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear text form, relating to the Insurance Premium message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments providing details of instalments.

segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date of an instalment.
MOA, A segment specifying the amount payable for an instalment.
